languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс неопределенно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Недостаточно. Но, по крайней мере, ксеносу преподадут урок".
{n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс неопределенно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Недостаточно. Но, по крайней мере, ксеносу преподадут урок".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shrugs his shoulders un-decidedly.{/n} "It won't be enough. But, well, at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shrugs his shoulders un-decidedly.{/n} "It won't be enough. But, well, at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

languages.text: {n}海因里希几不可察地耸了耸肩。{/n}“这对异形太过仁慈，但她至少得到了教训。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希几不可察地耸了耸肩。{/n}“这对异形太过仁慈，但她至少得到了教训。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se encoge ligeramente de hombros.{/n} «No es suficiente. Pero al menos la xenos aprenderá una lección».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se encoge ligeramente de hombros.{/n} «No es suficiente. Pero al menos la xenos aprenderá una lección».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse légèrement les épaules.{/n} « Ce n'est pas suffisant, mais cela servira de leçon à cette xénos. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse légèrement les épaules.{/n} « Ce n'est pas suffisant, mais cela servira de leçon à cette xénos. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zuckt vage mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das reicht nicht aus. Aber wenigstens wird der Xenos eine Lektion erteilt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zuckt vage mit den Schultern.{/n} "Das reicht nicht aus. Aber wenigstens wird der Xenos eine Lektion erteilt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあいまいに肩をすくめる。{/n}「それだけでは十分ではありませんね。しかし、少なくとも異種族どもには教訓となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあいまいに肩をすくめる。{/n}「それだけでは十分ではありませんね。しかし、少なくとも異種族どもには教訓となるでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, belli belirsiz bir şekilde omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bu yeterli değil. Gerçi zeno, en azından dersini alacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives a vague shrug.{/n} "That is not enough. But at least the xenos will be taught a lesson."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, belli belirsiz bir şekilde omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Bu yeterli değil. En azından zeno dersini alacak."
